page.title: 14ENTERTAINMENT IN BROOK
page.content: The only form of entertainment to be found in Brook is at the local pub,The {Hanover House Inn}. There is{live {entertainment}at the pub twice weekly, in the form of a singer who performs a wide variety of popular and folk songs.The landlord of the pub tells us that there is not a great demand for entertainment in Brook as most of the residents are retired, elderly couples. {The younger generation}in Brook can travel a mile down the road to "Barney's Road House",the local nightclub.
